bug.author: ryanjulian
bug.summary: test_examples integration test is sending false positives

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ryanjulian>@ryanjulian</denchmark-link>
 So 1 of example was being skipped ( fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/pull/1812>#1812</denchmark-link>
 ) and the other was erroring out after 3 epochs ( <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/pull/1815>#1815</denchmark-link>
 ) while we only run 1 epoch in test_examples. Is there anything we need to change in test_examples now? Or can we close this issue?
We should be detecting the failures which happen after 3 epochs.

Nothing to be done here. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/krzentner>@krzentner</denchmark-link> to open an issue about how <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/issues/1797>#1797</denchmark-link> could have been caught in tests
